page.title: 11OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
A survey of our particular area revealed the following statistics:_
Self employed _ 46 Employees _ 40 Local workers _ 23 Retired _ 19
OCCUPATIONS _ Farmers _ 17 Other occupations include:_ Designers, Managers, Directors, Solicitors, Chartered Accountants, Contractors, Property Developer, Colour Merchant, Vicar, Vet, Teacher, College Principal, College Lecturer, Builder, Publican, Engineer, Electrical Contractor, Cattle dealer,Computor Development Officer, Production Supervisor, Cattle Dealer, Nurseryman, Lorry driver, Plasterer.
